member.summary: The z position of the front of the box.

member.name: F:Vortice.Mathematics.Box.Right
member.summary: The x position of the right hand side of the box, plus 1. This means that Right - Left equals the width of the box.

member.name: F:Vortice.Mathematics.Box.Bottom
member.summary: The y position of the bottom of the box, plus 1. This means that top - bottom equals the height of the box.

member.name: F:Vortice.Mathematics.Box.Back
member.summary: The z position of the back of the box, plus 1. This means that front - back equals the depth of the box.

member.summary: The width of the box (equals to Right - Left).

member.name: P:Vortice.Mathematics.Box.Height
member.summary: The height of the box (equals to Top - Bottom).

member.name: P:Vortice.Mathematics.Box.Depth
member.summary: The depth of the box (equals to Front - Back).
